long_description: Reach for the women's Groovy Sunglasses from Julbo when you've got trails to run, mountains to climb and outdoor concerts to attend. Spectron 3 polycarbonate lenses with red flash mirroring block 88% of visible light and 100% of UV rays. Polycarbonate lenses are lightweight yet offer excellent shatter resistance. Wrap-around frame with curved temples holds fast to your head no matter how active you are. Julbo Groovy Sunglasses for women come with a protective case.
short_description: Reach for the women's Groovy Sunglasses from Julbo when you've got trails to run, mountains to climb and outdoor concerts to attend.
